text: , known professionally as , is a biracial (hāfu) Japanese Canadian model and tarento. She is known for many television shows such as Sport on Fuji TV (2009-), NTV's Hirunandesu! (2014-) and Buzz Rhythm (2015-). ==Career== Maggy is of Scottish Canadian (her father Iain Gibbhttp://www.ntv.co.jp/goten/oa/20140729/comment.html is a voice actor and narratorhttp://www.japantimes.co.jp/life/2004/06/26/people/iain-gibb/) and Japanese descent. As she spent her childhood in Halifax, Canada with relatives, she speaks both English and Japanese. In 2008, at the age of sixteen, she was scouted by her current agent, and won the Best Smile Award in the LesPros Girls Audition 2008. Then she made her debut in entertainment industry. In April 2009, she appeared in the sports news program Sport on Fuji TV. This show made her name popular. Since October 2014, she appears as a regular guest on NTV's variety show Hirunandesu! every Monday. She also hosts the variety show Buzz Rhythm with Japanese comedian Bakarhythm on NTV since April 2015. ==Appearances== ===Film=== *Tokyo Ghoul S (2019) ===Events=== * Girls Award (2011 S/S, 2011 A/W, 2014 A/W, 2015 S/S) * Tokyo Girls Collection (2011 A/W, 2012 A/W, in Nagoya, 2012 S/S, 2014 S/S, 2014 A/W, 2015 S/S) * Kobe Collection (2011 A/W, 2012 A/W, 2013 A/W) * Tokyo Runway (2012 A/W, 2013 S/S, 2013 A/W, 2014 A/W, 2015 S/S) ===Radio=== * Current (October 2011 - March 2013, FM Yokohama) * Hamarabo (April 2012 - September 2012, FM Yokohama) ==Discography== ===Singles=== * Niji no Mukou e (Sony Music Direct, 27 July 2011) ==Bibliography== ===Magazines=== * CUTiE, Takarajimasha 1989-, as a regular model * ViVi, Kodansha 1983-, as an exclusive model since 2010 ===Photobooks=== * Maggy,Maggy,Maggy…… (Kodansha, 18 November 2013) * I'm Maggy (Kodansha, 2 December 2015) * Your Maggy (Kodansha, 2 December 2015) ==References== ==External links== * * * Official Instagram Category:1992 births Category:Japanese television personalities Category:Japanese female models Category:Japanese gravure models Category:Japanese people of Canadian descent Category:Japanese people of Scottish descent Category:Living people Category:Models from Hyōgo Prefecture
title: Maggy (model)
